posts.post_content:
WHAT!? I read the first 3 words "destroy target creature" on a blue card and was like "oh boy", then I kept reading to find out the drawback isn't so bad at all, considering its cost only ![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol) at instant speed! It's like [Beast Within](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Beast Within) for creatures only, in blue! And it thwacks regenerators! Awesome! Blue removal! Then you can [unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=unsummon) the token or something like that to remove it completely!  
  
4.5/5
